Class DiscardResourcesController

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.DiscardResourcesController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Controller<Player>

    public class DiscardResourcesController
extends java.lang.Object
implements Controller<Player>
    The controller for the resources that the player has to discard due to the robber being moved.
    Author:
    Paula Wikidal

    • Method Detail

      • doInitializations

        public void doInitializations(Player player,
                              ClientConnection client)
        Description copied from interface: Controller
        Method for initializing everything, that needs to be done right after a FXML file and its controller have been loaded. It provides the possibility to pass an Object to the controller, e.g. the model object the view represents.
        Specified by:
        doInitializations in interface Controller<Player>
        Parameters:
        player - the object to pass to the controller.
        client - the ClientConnection used to send messages to the Server.
